title: 232 - Welcome Back, Tone
description: On today’s show, the boys welcome back Tone from paternity leave as they chat about Bruce totaling his car, what life is like as a dad, and much more before they jump into a loaded POD FOD discussing Will Smith being banned from the Oscar’s for 10 years, an Italian porn star being unhappy about his upcoming Netflix series, movies and TV shows they’ve been keeping tabs on, before jumping into a couple of videos that have the internet buzzing. Be sure to follow @ThePodPMI on Instagram and Twitter to submit your submissions to the Pod FOD, and watch on youtube as we approach 100,000 followers and a massive giveaway. We appreciate you all, we’ll see you next week.
dc:creator: The Pod
